1745 __ j(no_overflow, &done, Label::kNear);
1746 __ bind(&fail);
1747 __ Set(i.OutputRegister(1), 0);
1748 __ bind(&done);
1749 }
1750 break;
1751 case kSSEFloat64ToInt64:
1752 if (instr->InputAt(0)->IsFPRegister()) {
1753 __ Cvttsd2siq(i.OutputRegister(0), i.InputDoubleRegister(0));
1754 } else {
1755 __ Cvttsd2siq(i.OutputRegister(0), i.InputOperand(0));
1756 }
1757 if (instr->OutputCount() > 1) {
1758 __ Set(i.OutputRegister(1), 1);
1759 Label done;
1760 Label fail;
1761 __ Move(kScratchDoubleReg, static_cast<double>(INT64_MIN(-9223372036854775807L -1)));
1762 if (instr->InputAt(0)->IsFPRegister()) {
1763 __ Ucomisd(kScratchDoubleReg, i.InputDoubleRegister(0));
1764 } else {
1765 __ Ucomisd(kScratchDoubleReg, i.InputOperand(0));
1766 }
1767 // If the input is NaN, then the conversion fails.
1768 __ j(parity_even, &fail, Label::kNear);
1769 // If the input is INT64_MIN, then the conversion succeeds.
1770 __ j(equal, &done, Label::kNear);
1771 __ cmpq(i.OutputRegister(0), Immediate(1));
1772 // If the conversion results in INT64_MIN, but the input was not
1773 // INT64_MIN, then the conversion fails.
1774 __ j(no_overflow, &done, Label::kNear);
1775 __ bind(&fail);
1776 __ Set(i.OutputRegister(1), 0);
1777 __ bind(&done);
1778 }
1779 break;
1780 case kSSEFloat32ToUint64: {
1781 Label fail;
1782 if (instr->OutputCount() > 1) __ Set(i.OutputRegister(1), 0);
1783 if (instr->InputAt(0)->IsFPRegister()) {
1784 __ Cvttss2uiq(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputDoubleRegister(0), &fail);
1785 } else {
1786 __ Cvttss2uiq(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputOperand(0), &fail);
1787 }
1788 if (instr->OutputCount() > 1) __ Set(i.OutputRegister(1), 1);
1789 __ bind(&fail);
1790 break;
1791 }
1792 case kSSEFloat64ToUint64: {
1793 Label fail;
1794 if (instr->OutputCount() > 1) __ Set(i.OutputRegister(1), 0);
1795 if (instr->InputAt(0)->IsFPRegister()) {
1796 __ Cvttsd2uiq(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputDoubleRegister(0), &fail);
1797 } else {
1798 __ Cvttsd2uiq(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputOperand(0), &fail);
1799 }
1800 if (instr->OutputCount() > 1) __ Set(i.OutputRegister(1), 1);
1801 __ bind(&fail);
1802 break;
1803 }
1804 case kSSEInt32ToFloat64:
1805 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 0)) {
1806 __ Cvtlsi2sd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputRegister(0));
1807 } else {
1808 __ Cvtlsi2sd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputOperand(0));
1809 }
1810 break;
1811 case kSSEInt32ToFloat32:
1812 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 0)) {
1813 __ Cvtlsi2ss(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputRegister(0));
1814 } else {
1815 __ Cvtlsi2ss(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputOperand(0));
1816 }
1817 break;
1818 case kSSEInt64ToFloat32:
1819 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 0)) {
1820 __ Cvtqsi2ss(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputRegister(0));
1821 } else {
1822 __ Cvtqsi2ss(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputOperand(0));
1823 }
1824 break;
1825 case kSSEInt64ToFloat64:
1826 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 0)) {
1827 __ Cvtqsi2sd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputRegister(0));
1828 } else {
1829 __ Cvtqsi2sd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputOperand(0));
1830 }
1831 break;
1832 case kSSEUint64ToFloat32:
1833 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 0)) {
1834 __ Cvtqui2ss(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputRegister(0));
1835 } else {
1836 __ Cvtqui2ss(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputOperand(0));
1837 }
1838 break;
1839 case kSSEUint64ToFloat64:
1840 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 0)) {
1841 __ Cvtqui2sd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputRegister(0));
1842 } else {
1843 __ Cvtqui2sd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputOperand(0));
1844 }
1845 break;
1846 case kSSEUint32ToFloat64:
1847 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 0)) {
1848 __ Cvtlui2sd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputRegister(0));
1849 } else {
1850 __ Cvtlui2sd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputOperand(0));
1851 }
1852 break;
1853 case kSSEUint32ToFloat32:
1854 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 0)) {
1855 __ Cvtlui2ss(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputRegister(0));
1856 } else {
1857 __ Cvtlui2ss(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputOperand(0));
1858 }
1859 break;
1860 case kSSEFloat64ExtractLowWord32:
1861 if (instr->InputAt(0)->IsFPStackSlot()) {
1862 __ movl(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputOperand(0));
1863 } else {
1864 __ Movd(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputDoubleRegister(0));
1865 }
1866 break;
1867 case kSSEFloat64ExtractHighWord32:
1868 if (instr->InputAt(0)->IsFPStackSlot()) {
1869 __ movl(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputOperand(0, kDoubleSize / 2));
1870 } else {
1871 __ Pextrd(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputDoubleRegister(0), 1);
1872 }
1873 break;
1874 case kSSEFloat64InsertLowWord32:
1875 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 1)) {
1876 __ Pinsrd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputRegister(1), 0);
1877 } else {
1878 __ Pinsrd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputOperand(1), 0);
1879 }
1880 break;
1881 case kSSEFloat64InsertHighWord32:
1882 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 1)) {
1883 __ Pinsrd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputRegister(1), 1);
1884 } else {
1885 __ Pinsrd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputOperand(1), 1);
1886 }
1887 break;
1888 case kSSEFloat64LoadLowWord32:
1889 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 0)) {
1890 __ Movd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputRegister(0));
1891 } else {
1892 __ Movd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputOperand(0));
1893 }
1894 break;
1895 case kAVXFloat32Cmp: {
1896 CpuFeatureScope avx_scope(tasm(), AVX);
1897 if (instr->InputAt(1)->IsFPRegister()) {
1898 __ vucomiss(i.InputDoubleRegister(0), i.InputDoubleRegister(1));
1899 } else {
1900 __ vucomiss(i.InputDoubleRegister(0), i.InputOperand(1));
1901 }
1902 break;
1903 }
1904 case kAVXFloat32Add:
1905 ASSEMBLE_AVX_BINOP(vaddss);
1906 break;
1907 case kAVXFloat32Sub:
1908 ASSEMBLE_AVX_BINOP(vsubss);
1909 break;
1910 case kAVXFloat32Mul:
1911 ASSEMBLE_AVX_BINOP(vmulss);
1912 break;
1913 case kAVXFloat32Div:
1914 ASSEMBLE_AVX_BINOP(vdivss);
1915 // Don't delete this mov. It may improve performance on some CPUs,
1916 // when there is a (v)mulss depending on the result.
1917 __ Movaps(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.OutputDoubleRegister());
1918 break;
1919 case kAVXFloat64Cmp: {
1920 CpuFeatureScope avx_scope(tasm(), AVX);
1921 if (instr->InputAt(1)->IsFPRegister()) {
1922 __ vucomisd(i.InputDoubleRegister(0), i.InputDoubleRegister(1));
1923 } else {
1924 __ vucomisd(i.InputDoubleRegister(0), i.InputOperand(1));
1925 }
1926 break;
1927 }
1928 case kAVXFloat64Add:
1929 ASSEMBLE_AVX_BINOP(vaddsd);
1930 break;
1931 case kAVXFloat64Sub:
1932 ASSEMBLE_AVX_BINOP(vsubsd);
1933 break;
1934 case kAVXFloat64Mul:
1935 ASSEMBLE_AVX_BINOP(vmulsd);
1936 break;
1937 case kAVXFloat64Div:
1938 ASSEMBLE_AVX_BINOP(vdivsd);
1939 // Don't delete this mov. It may improve performance on some CPUs,
1940 // when there is a (v)mulsd depending on the result.
1941 __ Movapd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.OutputDoubleRegister());
1942 break;
1943 case kAVXFloat32Abs: {
1944 // TODO(bmeurer): Use RIP relative 128-bit constants.
1945 CpuFeatureScope avx_scope(tasm(), AVX);
1946 XMMRegister tmp = i.ToDoubleRegister(instr->TempAt(0));
1947 __ vpcmpeqd(tmp, tmp, tmp);
1948 __ vpsrlq(tmp, tmp, 33);
1949 if (instr->InputAt(0)->IsFPRegister()) {
1950 __ vandps(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), tmp, i.InputDoubleRegister(0));
1951 } else {
1952 __ vandps(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), tmp, i.InputOperand(0));
1953 }
1954 break;
1955 }
1956 case kAVXFloat32Neg: {
1957 // TODO(bmeurer): Use RIP relative 128-bit constants.
1958 CpuFeatureScope avx_scope(tasm(), AVX);
1959 XMMRegister tmp = i.ToDoubleRegister(instr->TempAt(0));
1960 __ vpcmpeqd(tmp, tmp, tmp);
1961 __ vpsllq(tmp, tmp, 31);
1962 if (instr->InputAt(0)->IsFPRegister()) {
1963 __ vxorps(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), tmp, i.InputDoubleRegister(0));
1964 } else {
1965 __ vxorps(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), tmp, i.InputOperand(0));
1966 }
1967 break;
1968 }
1969 case kAVXFloat64Abs: {
1970 // TODO(bmeurer): Use RIP relative 128-bit constants.
1971 CpuFeatureScope avx_scope(tasm(), AVX);
1972 XMMRegister tmp = i.ToDoubleRegister(instr->TempAt(0));
1973 __ vpcmpeqd(tmp, tmp, tmp);
1974 __ vpsrlq(tmp, tmp, 1);
1975 if (instr->InputAt(0)->IsFPRegister()) {
1976 __ vandpd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), tmp, i.InputDoubleRegister(0));
1977 } else {
1978 __ vandpd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), tmp, i.InputOperand(0));
1979 }
1980 break;
1981 }
1982 case kAVXFloat64Neg: {
1983 // TODO(bmeurer): Use RIP relative 128-bit constants.
1984 CpuFeatureScope avx_scope(tasm(), AVX);
1985 XMMRegister tmp = i.ToDoubleRegister(instr->TempAt(0));
1986 __ vpcmpeqd(tmp, tmp, tmp);
1987 __ vpsllq(tmp, tmp, 63);
1988 if (instr->InputAt(0)->IsFPRegister()) {
1989 __ vxorpd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), tmp, i.InputDoubleRegister(0));
1990 } else {
1991 __ vxorpd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), tmp, i.InputOperand(0));
1992 }
1993 break;
1994 }
1995 case kSSEFloat64SilenceNaN:
1996 __ Xorpd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
1997 __ Subsd(i.InputDoubleRegister(0), kScratchDoubleReg);
1998 break;
1999 case kX64Movsxbl:
2000 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
2001 ASSEMBLE_MOVX(movsxbl);
2002 __ AssertZeroExtended(i.OutputRegister());
2003 EmitWordLoadPoisoningIfNeeded(this, opcode, instr, i);
2004 break;
2005 case kX64Movzxbl:
2006 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
2007 ASSEMBLE_MOVX(movzxbl);
2008 __ AssertZeroExtended(i.OutputRegister());
2009 EmitWordLoadPoisoningIfNeeded(this, opcode, instr, i);
2010 break;
2011 case kX64Movsxbq:
2012 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
2013 ASSEMBLE_MOVX(movsxbq);
2014 EmitWordLoadPoisoningIfNeeded(this, opcode, instr, i);
2015 break;
2016 case kX64Movzxbq:
2017 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
2018 ASSEMBLE_MOVX(movzxbq);
2019 __ AssertZeroExtended(i.OutputRegister());
2020 EmitWordLoadPoisoningIfNeeded(this, opcode, instr, i);
2021 break;
2022 case kX64Movb: {
2023 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
2024 size_t index = 0;
2025 Operand operand = i.MemoryOperand(&index);
2026 if (HasImmediateInput(instr, index)) {
2027 __ movb(operand, Immediate(i.InputInt8(index)));
2028 } else {
2029 __ movb(operand, i.InputRegister(index));
2030 }
2031 EmitWordLoadPoisoningIfNeeded(this, opcode, instr, i);
2032 break;
2033 }
2034 case kX64Movsxwl:
2035 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
2036 ASSEMBLE_MOVX(movsxwl);
2037 __ AssertZeroExtended(i.OutputRegister());
2038 EmitWordLoadPoisoningIfNeeded(this, opcode, instr, i);
2039 break;
2040 case kX64Movzxwl:
2041 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
2042 ASSEMBLE_MOVX(movzxwl);
2043 __ AssertZeroExtended(i.OutputRegister());
2044 EmitWordLoadPoisoningIfNeeded(this, opcode, instr, i);
2045 break;
2046 case kX64Movsxwq:
2047 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
2048 ASSEMBLE_MOVX(movsxwq);
2049 break;
2050 case kX64Movzxwq:
2051 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
2052 ASSEMBLE_MOVX(movzxwq);
2053 __ AssertZeroExtended(i.OutputRegister());
2054 EmitWordLoadPoisoningIfNeeded(this, opcode, instr, i);
2055 break;
2056 case kX64Movw: {
2057 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
2058 size_t index = 0;
2059 Operand operand = i.MemoryOperand(&index);
2060 if (HasImmediateInput(instr, index)) {
2061 __ movw(operand, Immediate(i.InputInt16(index)));
2062 } else {
2063 __ movw(operand, i.InputRegister(index));
2064 }
2065 EmitWordLoadPoisoningIfNeeded(this, opcode, instr, i);
2066 break;
2067 }
2068 case kX64Movl:
2069 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
2070 if (instr->HasOutput()) {
2071 if (HasAddressingMode(instr)) {
2072 __ movl(i.OutputRegister(), i.MemoryOperand());
2073 } else {
2074 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 0)) {
2075 __ movl(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputRegister(0));
2076 } else {
2077 __ movl(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputOperand(0));
2078 }
2079 }
2080 __ AssertZeroExtended(i.OutputRegister());
2081 } else {
2082 size_t index = 0;
2083 Operand operand = i.MemoryOperand(&index);
2084 if (HasImmediateInput(instr, index)) {
2085 __ movl(operand, i.InputImmediate(index));
2086 } else {
2087 __ movl(operand, i.InputRegister(index));
2088 }
2089 }
2090 EmitWordLoadPoisoningIfNeeded(this, opcode, instr, i);
2091 break;
2092 case kX64Movsxlq:
2093 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
2094 ASSEMBLE_MOVX(movsxlq);
2095 EmitWordLoadPoisoningIfNeeded(this, opcode, instr, i);
2096 break;
2097 case kX64MovqDecompressTaggedSigned: {
2098 CHECK(instr->HasOutput())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(instr->HasOutput())), 0)))
{ V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "instr->HasOutput()"); } }
while (false);
2099 __ DecompressTaggedSigned(i.OutputRegister(), i.MemoryOperand());
2100 EmitWordLoadPoisoningIfNeeded(this, opcode, instr, i);
2101 break;
2102 }
2103 case kX64MovqDecompressTaggedPointer: {
2104 CHECK(instr->HasOutput())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(instr->HasOutput())), 0)))
{ V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "instr->HasOutput()"); } }
while (false);
2105 __ DecompressTaggedPointer(i.OutputRegister(), i.MemoryOperand());
2106 EmitWordLoadPoisoningIfNeeded(this, opcode, instr, i);
2107 break;
2108 }
2109 case kX64MovqDecompressAnyTagged: {
2110 CHECK(instr->HasOutput())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(instr->HasOutput())), 0)))
{ V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "instr->HasOutput()"); } }
while (false);
2111 __ DecompressAnyTagged(i.OutputRegister(), i.MemoryOperand());
2112 EmitWordLoadPoisoningIfNeeded(this, opcode, instr, i);
2113 break;
2114 }
2115 case kX64MovqCompressTagged: {
2116 CHECK(!instr->HasOutput())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(!instr->HasOutput())), 0))
) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "!instr->HasOutput()"); }
} while (false);
2117 size_t index = 0;
2118 Operand operand = i.MemoryOperand(&index);
2119 if (HasImmediateInput(instr, index)) {
2120 __ StoreTaggedField(operand, i.InputImmediate(index));
2121 } else {
2122 __ StoreTaggedField(operand, i.InputRegister(index));
2123 }
2124 break;
2125 }
2126 case kX64Movq:
2127 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
2128 if (instr->HasOutput()) {
2129 __ movq(i.OutputRegister(), i.MemoryOperand());
2130 } else {
2131 size_t index = 0;
2132 Operand operand = i.MemoryOperand(&index);
2133 if (HasImmediateInput(instr, index)) {
2134 __ movq(operand, i.InputImmediate(index));
2135 } else {
2136 __ movq(operand, i.InputRegister(index));
2137 }
2138 }
2139 EmitWordLoadPoisoningIfNeeded(this, opcode, instr, i);
2140 break;
2141 case kX64Movss:
2142 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
2143 if (instr->HasOutput()) {
2144 __ Movss(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.MemoryOperand());
2145 } else {
2146 size_t index = 0;
2147 Operand operand = i.MemoryOperand(&index);
2148 __ Movss(operand, i.InputDoubleRegister(index));
2149 }
2150 break;
2151 case kX64Movsd: {
2152 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
2153 if (instr->HasOutput()) {
2154 const MemoryAccessMode access_mode =
2155 static_cast<MemoryAccessMode>(MiscField::decode(opcode));
2156 if (access_mode == kMemoryAccessPoisoned) {
2157 // If we have to poison the loaded value, we load into a general
2158 // purpose register first, mask it with the poison, and move the
2159 // value from the general purpose register into the double register.
2160 __ movq(kScratchRegister, i.MemoryOperand());
2161 __ andq(kScratchRegister, kSpeculationPoisonRegister);
2162 __ Movq(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), kScratchRegister);
2163 } else {
2164 __ Movsd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.MemoryOperand());
2165 }
2166 } else {
2167 size_t index = 0;
2168 Operand operand = i.MemoryOperand(&index);
2169 __ Movsd(operand, i.InputDoubleRegister(index));
2170 }
2171 break;
2172 }
2173 case kX64Movdqu: {
2174 CpuFeatureScope sse_scope(tasm(), SSSE3);
2175 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
2176 if (instr->HasOutput()) {
2177 __ Movdqu(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.MemoryOperand());
2178 } else {
2179 size_t index = 0;
2180 Operand operand = i.MemoryOperand(&index);
2181 __ Movdqu(operand, i.InputSimd128Register(index));
2182 }
2183 break;
2184 }
2185 case kX64BitcastFI:
2186 if (instr->InputAt(0)->IsFPStackSlot()) {
2187 __ movl(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputOperand(0));
2188 } else {
2189 __ Movd(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputDoubleRegister(0));
2190 }
2191 break;
2192 case kX64BitcastDL:
2193 if (instr->InputAt(0)->IsFPStackSlot()) {
2194 __ movq(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputOperand(0));
2195 } else {
2196 __ Movq(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputDoubleRegister(0));
2197 }
2198 break;
2199 case kX64BitcastIF:
2200 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 0)) {
2201 __ Movd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputRegister(0));
2202 } else {
2203 __ Movss(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputOperand(0));
2204 }
2205 break;
2206 case kX64BitcastLD:
2207 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 0)) {
2208 __ Movq(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputRegister(0));
2209 } else {
2210 __ Movsd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), i.InputOperand(0));
2211 }
2212 break;
2213 case kX64Lea32: {
2214 AddressingMode mode = AddressingModeField::decode(instr->opcode());
2215 // Shorten "leal" to "addl", "subl" or "shll" if the register allocation
2216 // and addressing mode just happens to work out. The "addl"/"subl" forms
2217 // in these cases are faster based on measurements.
2218 if (i.InputRegister(0) == i.OutputRegister()) {
2219 if (mode == kMode_MRI) {
2220 int32_t constant_summand = i.InputInt32(1);
2221 DCHECK_NE(0, constant_summand)((void) 0);
2222 if (constant_summand > 0) {
2223 __ addl(i.OutputRegister(), Immediate(constant_summand));
2224 } else {
2225 __ subl(i.OutputRegister(),
2226 Immediate(base::NegateWithWraparound(constant_summand)));
2227 }
2228 } else if (mode == kMode_MR1) {
2229 if (i.InputRegister(1) == i.OutputRegister()) {
2230 __ shll(i.OutputRegister(), Immediate(1));
2231 } else {
2232 __ addl(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputRegister(1));
2233 }
2234 } else if (mode == kMode_M2) {
2235 __ shll(i.OutputRegister(), Immediate(1));
2236 } else if (mode == kMode_M4) {
2237 __ shll(i.OutputRegister(), Immediate(2));
2238 } else if (mode == kMode_M8) {
2239 __ shll(i.OutputRegister(), Immediate(3));
2240 } else {
2241 __ leal(i.OutputRegister(), i.MemoryOperand());
2242 }
2243 } else if (mode == kMode_MR1 &&
2244 i.InputRegister(1) == i.OutputRegister()) {
2245 __ addl(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputRegister(0));
2246 } else {
2247 __ leal(i.OutputRegister(), i.MemoryOperand());
2248 }
2249 __ AssertZeroExtended(i.OutputRegister());
2250 break;
2251 }
2252 case kX64Lea: {
2253 AddressingMode mode = AddressingModeField::decode(instr->opcode());
2254 // Shorten "leaq" to "addq", "subq" or "shlq" if the register allocation
2255 // and addressing mode just happens to work out. The "addq"/"subq" forms
2256 // in these cases are faster based on measurements.
2257 if (i.InputRegister(0) == i.OutputRegister()) {
2258 if (mode == kMode_MRI) {
2259 int32_t constant_summand = i.InputInt32(1);
2260 if (constant_summand > 0) {
2261 __ addq(i.OutputRegister(), Immediate(constant_summand));
2262 } else if (constant_summand < 0) {
2263 __ subq(i.OutputRegister(), Immediate(-constant_summand));
2264 }
2265 } else if (mode == kMode_MR1) {
2266 if (i.InputRegister(1) == i.OutputRegister()) {
2267 __ shlq(i.OutputRegister(), Immediate(1));
2268 } else {
2269 __ addq(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputRegister(1));
2270 }
2271 } else if (mode == kMode_M2) {
2272 __ shlq(i.OutputRegister(), Immediate(1));
2273 } else if (mode == kMode_M4) {
2274 __ shlq(i.OutputRegister(), Immediate(2));
2275 } else if (mode == kMode_M8) {
2276 __ shlq(i.OutputRegister(), Immediate(3));
2277 } else {
2278 __ leaq(i.OutputRegister(), i.MemoryOperand());
2279 }
2280 } else if (mode == kMode_MR1 &&
2281 i.InputRegister(1) == i.OutputRegister()) {
2282 __ addq(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputRegister(0));
2283 } else {
2284 __ leaq(i.OutputRegister(), i.MemoryOperand());
2285 }
2286 break;
2287 }
2288 case kX64Dec32:
2289 __ decl(i.OutputRegister());
2290 break;
2291 case kX64Inc32:
2292 __ incl(i.OutputRegister());
2293 break;
2294 case kX64Push:
2295 if (HasAddressingMode(instr)) {
2296 size_t index = 0;
2297 Operand operand = i.MemoryOperand(&index);
2298 __ pushq(operand);
2299 frame_access_state()->IncreaseSPDelta(1);
2300 unwinding_info_writer_.MaybeIncreaseBaseOffsetAt(__ pc_offset(),
2301 kSystemPointerSize);
2302 } else if (HasImmediateInput(instr, 0)) {
2303 __ pushq(i.InputImmediate(0));
2304 frame_access_state()->IncreaseSPDelta(1);
2305 unwinding_info_writer_.MaybeIncreaseBaseOffsetAt(__ pc_offset(),
2306 kSystemPointerSize);
2307 } else if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 0)) {
2308 __ pushq(i.InputRegister(0));
2309 frame_access_state()->IncreaseSPDelta(1);
2310 unwinding_info_writer_.MaybeIncreaseBaseOffsetAt(__ pc_offset(),
2311 kSystemPointerSize);
2312 } else if (instr->InputAt(0)->IsFloatRegister() ||
2313 instr->InputAt(0)->IsDoubleRegister()) {
2314 // TODO(titzer): use another machine instruction?
2315 __ AllocateStackSpace(kDoubleSize);
2316 frame_access_state()->IncreaseSPDelta(kDoubleSize / kSystemPointerSize);
2317 unwinding_info_writer_.MaybeIncreaseBaseOffsetAt(__ pc_offset(),
2318 kDoubleSize);
2319 __ Movsd(Operand(rsp, 0), i.InputDoubleRegister(0));
2320 } else if (instr->InputAt(0)->IsSimd128Register()) {
2321 // TODO(titzer): use another machine instruction?
2322 __ AllocateStackSpace(kSimd128Size);
2323 frame_access_state()->IncreaseSPDelta(kSimd128Size /
2324 kSystemPointerSize);
2325 unwinding_info_writer_.MaybeIncreaseBaseOffsetAt(__ pc_offset(),
2326 kSimd128Size);
2327 __ Movups(Operand(rsp, 0), i.InputSimd128Register(0));
2328 } else if (instr->InputAt(0)->IsStackSlot() ||
2329 instr->InputAt(0)->IsFloatStackSlot() ||
2330 instr->InputAt(0)->IsDoubleStackSlot()) {
2331 __ pushq(i.InputOperand(0));
2332 frame_access_state()->IncreaseSPDelta(1);
2333 unwinding_info_writer_.MaybeIncreaseBaseOffsetAt(__ pc_offset(),
2334 kSystemPointerSize);
2335 } else {
2336 DCHECK(instr->InputAt(0)->IsSimd128StackSlot())((void) 0);
2337 __ Movups(kScratchDoubleReg, i.InputOperand(0));
2338 // TODO(titzer): use another machine instruction?
2339 __ AllocateStackSpace(kSimd128Size);
2340 frame_access_state()->IncreaseSPDelta(kSimd128Size /
2341 kSystemPointerSize);
2342 unwinding_info_writer_.MaybeIncreaseBaseOffsetAt(__ pc_offset(),
2343 kSimd128Size);
2344 __ Movups(Operand(rsp, 0), kScratchDoubleReg);
2345 }
2346 break;
2347 case kX64Poke: {
2348 int slot = MiscField::decode(instr->opcode());
2349 if (HasImmediateInput(instr, 0)) {
2350 __ movq(Operand(rsp, slot * kSystemPointerSize), i.InputImmediate(0));
2351 } else {
2352 __ movq(Operand(rsp, slot * kSystemPointerSize), i.InputRegister(0));
2353 }
2354 break;
2355 }
2356 case kX64Peek: {
2357 int reverse_slot = i.InputInt32(0);
2358 int offset =
2359 FrameSlotToFPOffset(frame()->GetTotalFrameSlotCount() - reverse_slot);
2360 if (instr->OutputAt(0)->IsFPRegister()) {
2361 LocationOperand* op = LocationOperand::cast(instr->OutputAt(0));
2362 if (op->representation() == MachineRepresentation::kFloat64) {
2363 __ Movsd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), Operand(rbp, offset));
2364 } else if (op->representation() == MachineRepresentation::kFloat32) {
2365 __ Movss(i.OutputFloatRegister(), Operand(rbp, offset));
2366 } else {
2367 DCHECK_EQ(MachineRepresentation::kSimd128, op->representation())((void) 0);
2368 __ Movdqu(i.OutputSimd128Register(), Operand(rbp, offset));
2369 }
2370 } else {
2371 __ movq(i.OutputRegister(), Operand(rbp, offset));
2372 }
2373 break;
2374 }
2375 case kX64F64x2Splat: {
2376 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2377 if (instr->InputAt(0)->IsFPRegister()) {
2378 __ Movddup(dst, i.InputDoubleRegister(0));
2379 } else {
2380 __ Movddup(dst, i.InputOperand(0));
2381 }
2382 break;
2383 }
2384 case kX64F64x2ReplaceLane: {
2385 if (instr->InputAt(2)->IsFPRegister()) {
2386 __ Movq(kScratchRegister, i.InputDoubleRegister(2));
2387 __ Pinsrq(i.OutputSimd128Register(), kScratchRegister, i.InputInt8(1));
2388 } else {
2389 __ Pinsrq(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputOperand(2), i.InputInt8(1));
2390 }
2391 break;
2392 }
2393 case kX64F64x2ExtractLane: {
2394 __ Pextrq(kScratchRegister, i.InputSimd128Register(0), i.InputInt8(1));
2395 __ Movq(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), kScratchRegister);
2396 break;
2397 }
2398 case kX64F64x2Sqrt: {
2399 __ Sqrtpd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0));
2400 break;
2401 }
2402 case kX64F64x2Add: {
2403 ASSEMBLE_SSE_BINOP(Addpd);
2404 break;
2405 }
2406 case kX64F64x2Sub: {
2407 ASSEMBLE_SSE_BINOP(Subpd);
2408 break;
2409 }
2410 case kX64F64x2Mul: {
2411 ASSEMBLE_SSE_BINOP(Mulpd);
2412 break;
2413 }
2414 case kX64F64x2Div: {
2415 ASSEMBLE_SSE_BINOP(Divpd);
2416 break;
2417 }
2418 case kX64F64x2Min: {
2419 XMMRegister src1 = i.InputSimd128Register(1),
2420 dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2421 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2422 // The minpd instruction doesn't propagate NaNs and -0's in its first
2423 // operand. Perform minpd in both orders and compare results. Handle the
2424 // unlikely case of discrepancies out of line.
2425 __ Movapd(kScratchDoubleReg, src1);
2426 __ Minpd(kScratchDoubleReg, dst);
2427 __ Minpd(dst, src1);
2428 // Most likely there is no difference and we're done.
2429 __ Xorpd(kScratchDoubleReg, dst);
2430 __ Ptest(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
2431 auto ool = zone()->New<OutOfLineF64x2Min>(this, dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
2432 __ j(not_zero, ool->entry());
2433 __ bind(ool->exit());
2434 break;
2435 }
2436 case kX64F64x2Max: {
2437 XMMRegister src1 = i.InputSimd128Register(1),
2438 dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2439 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2440 // The maxpd instruction doesn't propagate NaNs and +0's in its first
2441 // operand. Perform maxpd in both orders and compare results. Handle the
2442 // unlikely case of discrepancies out of line.
2443 __ Movapd(kScratchDoubleReg, src1);
2444 __ Maxpd(kScratchDoubleReg, dst);
2445 __ Maxpd(dst, src1);
2446 // Most likely there is no difference and we're done.
2447 __ Xorpd(kScratchDoubleReg, dst);
2448 __ Ptest(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
2449 auto ool = zone()->New<OutOfLineF64x2Max>(this, dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
2450 __ j(not_zero, ool->entry());
2451 __ bind(ool->exit());
2452 break;
2453 }
2454 case kX64F64x2Eq: {
2455 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2456 __ Cmpeqpd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2457 break;
2458 }
2459 case kX64F64x2Ne: {
2460 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2461 __ Cmpneqpd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2462 break;
2463 }
2464 case kX64F64x2Lt: {
2465 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2466 __ Cmpltpd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2467 break;
2468 }
2469 case kX64F64x2Le: {
2470 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2471 __ Cmplepd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2472 break;
2473 }
2474 case kX64F64x2Qfma: {
2475 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(FMA3)) {
2476 CpuFeatureScope fma3_scope(tasm(), FMA3);
2477 __ vfmadd231pd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1),
2478 i.InputSimd128Register(2));
2479 } else {
2480 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
2481 __ Movapd(tmp, i.InputSimd128Register(2));
2482 __ Mulpd(tmp, i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2483 __ Addpd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), tmp);
2484 }
2485 break;
2486 }
2487 case kX64F64x2Qfms: {
2488 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(FMA3)) {
2489 CpuFeatureScope fma3_scope(tasm(), FMA3);
2490 __ vfnmadd231pd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1),
2491 i.InputSimd128Register(2));
2492 } else {
2493 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
2494 __ Movapd(tmp, i.InputSimd128Register(2));
2495 __ Mulpd(tmp, i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2496 __ Subpd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), tmp);
2497 }
2498 break;
2499 }
2500 // TODO(gdeepti): Get rid of redundant moves for F32x4Splat/Extract below
2501 case kX64F32x4Splat: {
2502 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2503 if (instr->InputAt(0)->IsFPRegister()) {
2504 __ Movss(dst, i.InputDoubleRegister(0));
2505 } else {
2506 __ Movss(dst, i.InputOperand(0));
2507 }
2508 __ Shufps(dst, dst, byte{0x0});
2509 break;
2510 }
2511 case kX64F32x4ExtractLane: {
2512 __ Extractps(kScratchRegister, i.InputSimd128Register(0), i.InputInt8(1));
2513 __ Movd(i.OutputDoubleRegister(), kScratchRegister);
2514 break;
2515 }
2516 case kX64F32x4ReplaceLane: {
2517 // The insertps instruction uses imm8[5:4] to indicate the lane
2518 // that needs to be replaced.
2519 byte select = i.InputInt8(1) << 4 & 0x30;
2520 if (instr->InputAt(2)->IsFPRegister()) {
2521 __ Insertps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputDoubleRegister(2),
2522 select);
2523 } else {
2524 __ Insertps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputOperand(2), select);
2525 }
2526 break;
2527 }
2528 case kX64F32x4SConvertI32x4: {
2529 __ Cvtdq2ps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0));
2530 break;
2531 }
2532 case kX64F32x4UConvertI32x4: {
2533 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2534 DCHECK_NE(i.OutputSimd128Register(), kScratchDoubleReg)((void) 0);
2535 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2536 __ Pxor(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg); // zeros
2537 __ Pblendw(kScratchDoubleReg, dst, uint8_t{0x55}); // get lo 16 bits
2538 __ Psubd(dst, kScratchDoubleReg); // get hi 16 bits
2539 __ Cvtdq2ps(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg); // convert lo exactly
2540 __ Psrld(dst, byte{1}); // divide by 2 to get in unsigned range
2541 __ Cvtdq2ps(dst, dst); // convert hi exactly
2542 __ Addps(dst, dst); // double hi, exactly
2543 __ Addps(dst, kScratchDoubleReg); // add hi and lo, may round.
2544 break;
2545 }
2546 case kX64F32x4Abs: {
2547 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2548 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(0);
2549 if (dst == src) {
2550 __ Pcmpeqd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
2551 __ Psrld(kScratchDoubleReg, byte{1});
2552 __ Andps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2553 } else {
2554 __ Pcmpeqd(dst, dst);
2555 __ Psrld(dst, byte{1});
2556 __ Andps(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0));
2557 }
2558 break;
2559 }
2560 case kX64F32x4Neg: {
2561 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2562 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(0);
2563 if (dst == src) {
2564 __ Pcmpeqd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
2565 __ Pslld(kScratchDoubleReg, byte{31});
2566 __ Xorps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2567 } else {
2568 __ Pcmpeqd(dst, dst);
2569 __ Pslld(dst, byte{31});
2570 __ Xorps(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0));
2571 }
2572 break;
2573 }
2574 case kX64F32x4Sqrt: {
2575 __ Sqrtps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0));
2576 break;
2577 }
2578 case kX64F32x4RecipApprox: {
2579 __ Rcpps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0));
2580 break;
2581 }
2582 case kX64F32x4RecipSqrtApprox: {
2583 __ Rsqrtps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0));
2584 break;
2585 }
2586 case kX64F32x4Add: {
2587 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2588 __ Addps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2589 break;
2590 }
2591 case kX64F32x4AddHoriz: {
2592 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2593 __ Haddps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2594 break;
2595 }
2596 case kX64F32x4Sub: {
2597 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2598 __ Subps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2599 break;
2600 }
2601 case kX64F32x4Mul: {
2602 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2603 __ Mulps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2604 break;
2605 }
2606 case kX64F32x4Div: {
2607 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2608 __ Divps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2609 break;
2610 }
2611 case kX64F32x4Min: {
2612 XMMRegister src1 = i.InputSimd128Register(1),
2613 dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2614 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2615 // The minps instruction doesn't propagate NaNs and -0's in its first
2616 // operand. Perform minps in both orders and compare results. Handle the
2617 // unlikely case of discrepancies out of line.
2618 __ Movaps(kScratchDoubleReg, src1);
2619 __ Minps(kScratchDoubleReg, dst);
2620 __ Minps(dst, src1);
2621 // Most likely there is no difference and we're done.
2622 __ Xorps(kScratchDoubleReg, dst);
2623 __ Ptest(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
2624 auto ool = zone()->New<OutOfLineF32x4Min>(this, dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
2625 __ j(not_zero, ool->entry());
2626 __ bind(ool->exit());
2627 break;
2628 }
2629 case kX64F32x4Max: {
2630 XMMRegister src1 = i.InputSimd128Register(1),
2631 dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2632 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2633 // The maxps instruction doesn't propagate NaNs and +0's in its first
2634 // operand. Perform maxps in both orders and compare results. Handle the
2635 // unlikely case of discrepancies out of line.
2636 __ Movaps(kScratchDoubleReg, src1);
2637 __ Maxps(kScratchDoubleReg, dst);
2638 __ Maxps(dst, src1);
2639 // Most likely there is no difference and we're done.
2640 __ Xorps(kScratchDoubleReg, dst);
2641 __ Ptest(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
2642 auto ool = zone()->New<OutOfLineF32x4Max>(this, dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
2643 __ j(not_zero, ool->entry());
2644 __ bind(ool->exit());
2645 break;
2646 }
2647 case kX64F32x4Eq: {
2648 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2649 __ Cmpps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1),
2650 int8_t{0x0});
2651 break;
2652 }
2653 case kX64F32x4Ne: {
2654 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2655 __ Cmpps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1),
2656 int8_t{0x4});
2657 break;
2658 }
2659 case kX64F32x4Lt: {
2660 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2661 __ Cmpltps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2662 break;
2663 }
2664 case kX64F32x4Le: {
2665 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2666 __ Cmpleps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2667 break;
2668 }
2669 case kX64F32x4Qfma: {
2670 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(FMA3)) {
2671 CpuFeatureScope fma3_scope(tasm(), FMA3);
2672 __ vfmadd231ps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1),
2673 i.InputSimd128Register(2));
2674 } else {
2675 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
2676 __ Movaps(tmp, i.InputSimd128Register(2));
2677 __ Mulps(tmp, i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2678 __ Addps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), tmp);
2679 }
2680 break;
2681 }
2682 case kX64F32x4Qfms: {
2683 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(FMA3)) {
2684 CpuFeatureScope fma3_scope(tasm(), FMA3);
2685 __ vfnmadd231ps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1),
2686 i.InputSimd128Register(2));
2687 } else {
2688 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
2689 __ Movaps(tmp, i.InputSimd128Register(2));
2690 __ Mulps(tmp, i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2691 __ Subps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), tmp);
2692 }
2693 break;
2694 }
2695 case kX64F32x4Pmin: {
2696 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2697 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2698 __ Minps(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2699 break;
2700 }
2701 case kX64F32x4Pmax: {
2702 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2703 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2704 __ Maxps(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2705 break;
2706 }
2707 case kX64F32x4Round: {
2708 RoundingMode const mode =
2709 static_cast<RoundingMode>(MiscField::decode(instr->opcode()));
2710 __ Roundps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0), mode);
2711 break;
2712 }
2713 case kX64F64x2Round: {
2714 RoundingMode const mode =
2715 static_cast<RoundingMode>(MiscField::decode(instr->opcode()));
2716 __ Roundpd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0), mode);
2717 break;
2718 }
2719 case kX64F64x2Pmin: {
2720 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2721 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2722 __ Minpd(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2723 break;
2724 }
2725 case kX64F64x2Pmax: {
2726 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2727 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2728 __ Maxpd(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2729 break;
2730 }
2731 case kX64I64x2Splat: {
2732 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2733 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 0)) {
2734 __ Movq(dst, i.InputRegister(0));
2735 } else {
2736 __ Movq(dst, i.InputOperand(0));
2737 }
2738 __ Movddup(dst, dst);
2739 break;
2740 }
2741 case kX64I64x2ExtractLane: {
2742 __ Pextrq(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputSimd128Register(0), i.InputInt8(1));
2743 break;
2744 }
2745 case kX64I64x2ReplaceLane: {
2746 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 2)) {
2747 __ Pinsrq(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputRegister(2),
2748 i.InputInt8(1));
2749 } else {
2750 __ Pinsrq(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputOperand(2), i.InputInt8(1));
2751 }
2752 break;
2753 }
2754 case kX64I64x2Neg: {
2755 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2756 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(0);
2757 if (dst == src) {
2758 __ Movapd(kScratchDoubleReg, src);
2759 src = kScratchDoubleReg;
2760 }
2761 __ Pxor(dst, dst);
2762 __ Psubq(dst, src);
2763 break;
2764 }
2765 case kX64I64x2Shl: {
2766 // Take shift value modulo 2^6.
2767 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_SHIFT(Psllq, 6);
2768 break;
2769 }
2770 case kX64I64x2ShrS: {
2771 // TODO(zhin): there is vpsraq but requires AVX512
2772 // ShrS on each quadword one at a time
2773 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2774 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(0);
2775 Register tmp = i.ToRegister(instr->TempAt(0));
2776 // Modulo 64 not required as sarq_cl will mask cl to 6 bits.
2777
2778 // lower quadword
2779 __ Pextrq(tmp, src, int8_t{0x0});
2780 __ sarq_cl(tmp);
2781 __ Pinsrq(dst, tmp, int8_t{0x0});
2782
2783 // upper quadword
2784 __ Pextrq(tmp, src, int8_t{0x1});
2785 __ sarq_cl(tmp);
2786 __ Pinsrq(dst, tmp, int8_t{0x1});
2787 break;
2788 }
2789 case kX64I64x2Add: {
2790 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2791 __ Paddq(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2792 break;
2793 }
2794 case kX64I64x2Sub: {
2795 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2796 __ Psubq(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2797 break;
2798 }
2799 case kX64I64x2Mul: {
2800 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2801 XMMRegister left = i.InputSimd128Register(0);
2802 XMMRegister right = i.InputSimd128Register(1);
2803 XMMRegister tmp1 = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
2804 XMMRegister tmp2 = i.TempSimd128Register(1);
2805
2806 __ Movaps(tmp1, left);
2807 __ Movaps(tmp2, right);
2808
2809 // Multiply high dword of each qword of left with right.
2810 __ Psrlq(tmp1, 32);
2811 __ Pmuludq(tmp1, right);
2812
2813 // Multiply high dword of each qword of right with left.
2814 __ Psrlq(tmp2, 32);
2815 __ Pmuludq(tmp2, left);
2816
2817 __ Paddq(tmp2, tmp1);
2818 __ Psllq(tmp2, 32);
2819
2820 __ Pmuludq(left, right);
2821 __ Paddq(left, tmp2); // left == dst
2822 break;
2823 }
2824 case kX64I64x2MinS: {
2825 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(SSE4_2)) {
2826 CpuFeatureScope sse_scope_4_2(tasm(), SSE4_2);
2827 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2828 XMMRegister src0 = i.InputSimd128Register(0);
2829 XMMRegister src1 = i.InputSimd128Register(1);
2830 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
2831 DCHECK_EQ(tmp, xmm0)((void) 0);
2832
2833 __ movaps(tmp, src1);
2834 __ pcmpgtq(tmp, src0);
2835 __ movaps(dst, src1);
2836 __ blendvpd(dst, src0); // implicit use of xmm0 as mask
2837 } else {
2838 CpuFeatureScope sse_scope_4_1(tasm(), SSE4_1);
2839 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2840 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(1);
2841 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
2842 Register tmp1 = i.TempRegister(1);
2843 Register tmp2 = i.TempRegister(2);
2844 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2845 // backup src since we cannot change it
2846 __ movaps(tmp, src);
2847
2848 // compare the lower quardwords
2849 __ movq(tmp1, dst);
2850 __ movq(tmp2, tmp);
2851 __ cmpq(tmp1, tmp2);
2852 // tmp2 now has the min of lower quadwords
2853 __ cmovq(less_equal, tmp2, tmp1);
2854 // tmp1 now has the higher quadword
2855 // must do this before movq, movq clears top quadword
2856 __ pextrq(tmp1, dst, 1);
2857 // save tmp2 into dst
2858 __ movq(dst, tmp2);
2859 // tmp2 now has the higher quadword
2860 __ pextrq(tmp2, tmp, 1);
2861 // compare higher quadwords
2862 __ cmpq(tmp1, tmp2);
2863 // tmp2 now has the min of higher quadwords
2864 __ cmovq(less_equal, tmp2, tmp1);
2865 __ movq(tmp, tmp2);
2866 // dst = [tmp[0], dst[0]]
2867 __ punpcklqdq(dst, tmp);
2868 }
2869 break;
2870 }
2871 case kX64I64x2MaxS: {
2872 CpuFeatureScope sse_scope_4_2(tasm(), SSE4_2);
2873 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2874 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(1);
2875 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
2876 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2877 DCHECK_EQ(tmp, xmm0)((void) 0);
2878
2879 __ movaps(tmp, src);
2880 __ pcmpgtq(tmp, dst);
2881 __ blendvpd(dst, src); // implicit use of xmm0 as mask
2882 break;
2883 }
2884 case kX64I64x2Eq: {
2885 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2886 __ Pcmpeqq(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2887 break;
2888 }
2889 case kX64I64x2Ne: {
2890 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2891 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
2892 __ Pcmpeqq(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2893 __ Pcmpeqq(tmp, tmp);
2894 __ Pxor(i.OutputSimd128Register(), tmp);
2895 break;
2896 }
2897 case kX64I64x2GtS: {
2898 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2899 __ Pcmpgtq(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
2900 break;
2901 }
2902 case kX64I64x2GeS: {
2903 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2904 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2905 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(1);
2906 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
2907
2908 __ Movaps(tmp, src);
2909 __ Pcmpgtq(tmp, dst);
2910 __ Pcmpeqd(dst, dst);
2911 __ Pxor(dst, tmp);
2912 break;
2913 }
2914 case kX64I64x2ShrU: {
2915 // Take shift value modulo 2^6.
2916 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_SHIFT(Psrlq, 6);
2917 break;
2918 }
2919 case kX64I64x2MinU: {
2920 CpuFeatureScope sse_scope_4_2(tasm(), SSE4_2);
2921 CpuFeatureScope sse_scope_4_1(tasm(), SSE4_1);
2922 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2923 XMMRegister src0 = i.InputSimd128Register(0);
2924 XMMRegister src1 = i.InputSimd128Register(1);
2925 XMMRegister tmp0 = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
2926 XMMRegister tmp1 = i.TempSimd128Register(1);
2927 DCHECK_EQ(tmp1, xmm0)((void) 0);
2928
2929 __ movaps(dst, src1);
2930 __ movaps(tmp0, src0);
2931
2932 __ pcmpeqd(tmp1, tmp1);
2933 __ psllq(tmp1, 63);
2934
2935 __ pxor(tmp0, tmp1);
2936 __ pxor(tmp1, dst);
2937
2938 __ pcmpgtq(tmp1, tmp0);
2939 __ blendvpd(dst, src0); // implicit use of xmm0 as mask
2940 break;
2941 }
2942 case kX64I64x2MaxU: {
2943 CpuFeatureScope sse_scope_4_2(tasm(), SSE4_2);
2944 CpuFeatureScope sse_scope_4_1(tasm(), SSE4_1);
2945 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2946 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(1);
2947 XMMRegister dst_tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
2948 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(1);
2949 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2950 DCHECK_EQ(tmp, xmm0)((void) 0);
2951
2952 __ movaps(dst_tmp, dst);
2953
2954 __ pcmpeqd(tmp, tmp);
2955 __ psllq(tmp, 63);
2956
2957 __ pxor(dst_tmp, tmp);
2958 __ pxor(tmp, src);
2959
2960 __ pcmpgtq(tmp, dst_tmp);
2961 __ blendvpd(dst, src); // implicit use of xmm0 as mask
2962 break;
2963 }
2964 case kX64I64x2GtU: {
2965 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2966 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2967 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(1);
2968 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
2969
2970 __ Pcmpeqd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
2971 __ Psllq(kScratchDoubleReg, 63);
2972
2973 __ Movaps(tmp, src);
2974 __ Pxor(tmp, kScratchDoubleReg);
2975 __ Pxor(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
2976 __ Pcmpgtq(dst, tmp);
2977 break;
2978 }
2979 case kX64I64x2GeU: {
2980 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
2981 CpuFeatureScope sse_scope(tasm(), SSE4_2);
2982 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2983 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(1);
2984 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
2985
2986 __ Pcmpeqd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
2987 __ Psllq(kScratchDoubleReg, 63);
2988
2989 __ Movaps(tmp, src);
2990 __ Pxor(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
2991 __ Pxor(tmp, kScratchDoubleReg);
2992 __ Pcmpgtq(tmp, dst);
2993 __ Pcmpeqd(dst, dst);
2994 __ Pxor(dst, tmp);
2995 break;
2996 }
2997 case kX64I32x4Splat: {
2998 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
2999 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 0)) {
3000 __ Movd(dst, i.InputRegister(0));
3001 } else {
3002 __ Movd(dst, i.InputOperand(0));
3003 }
3004 __ Pshufd(dst, dst, uint8_t{0x0});
3005 break;
3006 }
3007 case kX64I32x4ExtractLane: {
3008 __ Pextrd(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputSimd128Register(0), i.InputInt8(1));
3009 break;
3010 }
3011 case kX64I32x4ReplaceLane: {
3012 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 2)) {
3013 __ Pinsrd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputRegister(2),
3014 i.InputInt8(1));
3015 } else {
3016 __ Pinsrd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputOperand(2), i.InputInt8(1));
3017 }
3018 break;
3019 }
3020 case kX64I32x4SConvertF32x4: {
3021 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
3022 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3023 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
3024 // NAN->0
3025 __ Movaps(tmp, dst);
3026 __ Cmpeqps(tmp, tmp);
3027 __ Pand(dst, tmp);
3028 // Set top bit if >= 0 (but not -0.0!)
3029 __ Pxor(tmp, dst);
3030 // Convert
3031 __ Cvttps2dq(dst, dst);
3032 // Set top bit if >=0 is now < 0
3033 __ Pand(tmp, dst);
3034 __ Psrad(tmp, byte{31});
3035 // Set positive overflow lanes to 0x7FFFFFFF
3036 __ Pxor(dst, tmp);
3037 break;
3038 }
3039 case kX64I32x4SConvertI16x8Low: {
3040 __ Pmovsxwd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0));
3041 break;
3042 }
3043 case kX64I32x4SConvertI16x8High: {
3044 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3045 __ Palignr(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0), uint8_t{8});
3046 __ Pmovsxwd(dst, dst);
3047 break;
3048 }
3049 case kX64I32x4Neg: {
3050 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3051 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(0);
3052 if (dst == src) {
3053 __ Pcmpeqd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
3054 __ Psignd(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
3055 } else {
3056 __ Pxor(dst, dst);
3057 __ Psubd(dst, src);
3058 }
3059 break;
3060 }
3061 case kX64I32x4Shl: {
3062 // Take shift value modulo 2^5.
3063 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_SHIFT(Pslld, 5);
3064 break;
3065 }
3066 case kX64I32x4ShrS: {
3067 // Take shift value modulo 2^5.
3068 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_SHIFT(Psrad, 5);
3069 break;
3070 }
3071 case kX64I32x4Add: {
3072 __ Paddd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3073 break;
3074 }
3075 case kX64I32x4AddHoriz: {
3076 __ Phaddd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3077 break;
3078 }
3079 case kX64I32x4Sub: {
3080 __ Psubd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3081 break;
3082 }
3083 case kX64I32x4Mul: {
3084 __ Pmulld(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3085 break;
3086 }
3087 case kX64I32x4MinS: {
3088 __ Pminsd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3089 break;
3090 }
3091 case kX64I32x4MaxS: {
3092 __ Pmaxsd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3093 break;
3094 }
3095 case kX64I32x4Eq: {
3096 __ Pcmpeqd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3097 break;
3098 }
3099 case kX64I32x4Ne: {
3100 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
3101 __ Pcmpeqd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3102 __ Pcmpeqd(tmp, tmp);
3103 __ Pxor(i.OutputSimd128Register(), tmp);
3104 break;
3105 }
3106 case kX64I32x4GtS: {
3107 __ Pcmpgtd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3108 break;
3109 }
3110 case kX64I32x4GeS: {
3111 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3112 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(1);
3113 __ Pminsd(dst, src);
3114 __ Pcmpeqd(dst, src);
3115 break;
3116 }
3117 case kX64I32x4UConvertF32x4: {
3118 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
3119 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3120 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
3121 XMMRegister tmp2 = i.TempSimd128Register(1);
3122 // NAN->0, negative->0
3123 __ Pxor(tmp2, tmp2);
3124 __ Maxps(dst, tmp2);
3125 // scratch: float representation of max_signed
3126 __ Pcmpeqd(tmp2, tmp2);
3127 __ Psrld(tmp2, uint8_t{1}); // 0x7fffffff
3128 __ Cvtdq2ps(tmp2, tmp2); // 0x4f000000
3129 // tmp: convert (src-max_signed).
3130 // Positive overflow lanes -> 0x7FFFFFFF
3131 // Negative lanes -> 0
3132 __ Movaps(tmp, dst);
3133 __ Subps(tmp, tmp2);
3134 __ Cmpleps(tmp2, tmp);
3135 __ Cvttps2dq(tmp, tmp);
3136 __ Pxor(tmp, tmp2);
3137 __ Pxor(tmp2, tmp2);
3138 __ Pmaxsd(tmp, tmp2);
3139 // convert. Overflow lanes above max_signed will be 0x80000000
3140 __ Cvttps2dq(dst, dst);
3141 // Add (src-max_signed) for overflow lanes.
3142 __ Paddd(dst, tmp);
3143 break;
3144 }
3145 case kX64I32x4UConvertI16x8Low: {
3146 __ Pmovzxwd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0));
3147 break;
3148 }
3149 case kX64I32x4UConvertI16x8High: {
3150 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3151 __ Palignr(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0), uint8_t{8});
3152 __ Pmovzxwd(dst, dst);
3153 break;
3154 }
3155 case kX64I32x4ShrU: {
3156 // Take shift value modulo 2^5.
3157 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_SHIFT(Psrld, 5);
3158 break;
3159 }
3160 case kX64I32x4MinU: {
3161 __ Pminud(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3162 break;
3163 }
3164 case kX64I32x4MaxU: {
3165 __ Pmaxud(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3166 break;
3167 }
3168 case kX64I32x4GtU: {
3169 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3170 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(1);
3171 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
3172 __ Pmaxud(dst, src);
3173 __ Pcmpeqd(dst, src);
3174 __ Pcmpeqd(tmp, tmp);
3175 __ Pxor(dst, tmp);
3176 break;
3177 }
3178 case kX64I32x4GeU: {
3179 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3180 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(1);
3181 __ Pminud(dst, src);
3182 __ Pcmpeqd(dst, src);
3183 break;
3184 }
3185 case kX64I32x4Abs: {
3186 __ Pabsd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0));
3187 break;
3188 }
3189 case kX64I32x4BitMask: {
3190 __ Movmskps(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputSimd128Register(0));
3191 break;
3192 }
3193 case kX64I32x4DotI16x8S: {
3194 __ Pmaddwd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3195 break;
3196 }
3197 case kX64S128Const: {
3198 // Emit code for generic constants as all zeros, or ones cases will be
3199 // handled separately by the selector.
3200 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3201 uint32_t imm[4] = {};
3202 for (int j = 0; j < 4; j++) {
3203 imm[j] = i.InputUint32(j);
3204 }
3205 SetupSimdImmediateInRegister(tasm(), imm, dst);
3206 break;
3207 }
3208 case kX64S128Zero: {
3209 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3210 __ Xorps(dst, dst);
3211 break;
3212 }
3213 case kX64S128AllOnes: {
3214 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3215 __ Pcmpeqd(dst, dst);
3216 break;
3217 }
3218 case kX64I16x8Splat: {
3219 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3220 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 0)) {
3221 __ Movd(dst, i.InputRegister(0));
3222 } else {
3223 __ Movd(dst, i.InputOperand(0));
3224 }
3225 __ Pshuflw(dst, dst, uint8_t{0x0});
3226 __ Pshufd(dst, dst, uint8_t{0x0});
3227 break;
3228 }
3229 case kX64I16x8ExtractLaneU: {
3230 Register dst = i.OutputRegister();
3231 __ Pextrw(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0), i.InputInt8(1));
3232 break;
3233 }
3234 case kX64I16x8ExtractLaneS: {
3235 Register dst = i.OutputRegister();
3236 __ Pextrw(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0), i.InputInt8(1));
3237 __ movsxwl(dst, dst);
3238 break;
3239 }
3240 case kX64I16x8ReplaceLane: {
3241 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 2)) {
3242 __ Pinsrw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputRegister(2),
3243 i.InputInt8(1));
3244 } else {
3245 __ Pinsrw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputOperand(2), i.InputInt8(1));
3246 }
3247 break;
3248 }
3249 case kX64I16x8SConvertI8x16Low: {
3250 __ Pmovsxbw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0));
3251 break;
3252 }
3253 case kX64I16x8SConvertI8x16High: {
3254 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3255 __ Palignr(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0), uint8_t{8});
3256 __ Pmovsxbw(dst, dst);
3257 break;
3258 }
3259 case kX64I16x8Neg: {
3260 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3261 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(0);
3262 if (dst == src) {
3263 __ Pcmpeqd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
3264 __ Psignw(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
3265 } else {
3266 __ Pxor(dst, dst);
3267 __ Psubw(dst, src);
3268 }
3269 break;
3270 }
3271 case kX64I16x8Shl: {
3272 // Take shift value modulo 2^4.
3273 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_SHIFT(Psllw, 4);
3274 break;
3275 }
3276 case kX64I16x8ShrS: {
3277 // Take shift value modulo 2^4.
3278 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_SHIFT(Psraw, 4);
3279 break;
3280 }
3281 case kX64I16x8SConvertI32x4: {
3282 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
3283 __ Packssdw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3284 break;
3285 }
3286 case kX64I16x8Add: {
3287 __ Paddw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3288 break;
3289 }
3290 case kX64I16x8AddSaturateS: {
3291 __ Paddsw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3292 break;
3293 }
3294 case kX64I16x8AddHoriz: {
3295 __ Phaddw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3296 break;
3297 }
3298 case kX64I16x8Sub: {
3299 __ Psubw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3300 break;
3301 }
3302 case kX64I16x8SubSaturateS: {
3303 __ Psubsw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3304 break;
3305 }
3306 case kX64I16x8Mul: {
3307 __ Pmullw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3308 break;
3309 }
3310 case kX64I16x8MinS: {
3311 __ Pminsw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3312 break;
3313 }
3314 case kX64I16x8MaxS: {
3315 __ Pmaxsw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3316 break;
3317 }
3318 case kX64I16x8Eq: {
3319 __ Pcmpeqw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3320 break;
3321 }
3322 case kX64I16x8Ne: {
3323 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
3324 __ Pcmpeqw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3325 __ Pcmpeqw(tmp, tmp);
3326 __ Pxor(i.OutputSimd128Register(), tmp);
3327 break;
3328 }
3329 case kX64I16x8GtS: {
3330 __ Pcmpgtw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3331 break;
3332 }
3333 case kX64I16x8GeS: {
3334 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3335 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(1);
3336 __ Pminsw(dst, src);
3337 __ Pcmpeqw(dst, src);
3338 break;
3339 }
3340 case kX64I16x8UConvertI8x16Low: {
3341 __ Pmovzxbw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0));
3342 break;
3343 }
3344 case kX64I16x8UConvertI8x16High: {
3345 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3346 __ Palignr(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0), uint8_t{8});
3347 __ Pmovzxbw(dst, dst);
3348 break;
3349 }
3350 case kX64I16x8ShrU: {
3351 // Take shift value modulo 2^4.
3352 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_SHIFT(Psrlw, 4);
3353 break;
3354 }
3355 case kX64I16x8UConvertI32x4: {
3356 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
3357 __ Packusdw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3358 break;
3359 }
3360 case kX64I16x8AddSaturateU: {
3361 __ Paddusw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3362 break;
3363 }
3364 case kX64I16x8SubSaturateU: {
3365 __ Psubusw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3366 break;
3367 }
3368 case kX64I16x8MinU: {
3369 __ Pminuw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3370 break;
3371 }
3372 case kX64I16x8MaxU: {
3373 __ Pmaxuw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3374 break;
3375 }
3376 case kX64I16x8GtU: {
3377 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3378 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(1);
3379 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
3380 __ Pmaxuw(dst, src);
3381 __ Pcmpeqw(dst, src);
3382 __ Pcmpeqw(tmp, tmp);
3383 __ Pxor(dst, tmp);
3384 break;
3385 }
3386 case kX64I16x8GeU: {
3387 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3388 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(1);
3389 __ Pminuw(dst, src);
3390 __ Pcmpeqw(dst, src);
3391 break;
3392 }
3393 case kX64I16x8RoundingAverageU: {
3394 __ Pavgw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3395 break;
3396 }
3397 case kX64I16x8Abs: {
3398 __ Pabsw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0));
3399 break;
3400 }
3401 case kX64I16x8BitMask: {
3402 Register dst = i.OutputRegister();
3403 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
3404 __ Packsswb(tmp, i.InputSimd128Register(0));
3405 __ Pmovmskb(dst, tmp);
3406 __ shrq(dst, Immediate(8));
3407 break;
3408 }
3409 case kX64I8x16Splat: {
3410 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3411 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 0)) {
3412 __ Movd(dst, i.InputRegister(0));
3413 } else {
3414 __ Movd(dst, i.InputOperand(0));
3415 }
3416 __ Xorps(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
3417 __ Pshufb(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
3418 break;
3419 }
3420 case kX64I8x16ExtractLaneU: {
3421 Register dst = i.OutputRegister();
3422 __ Pextrb(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0), i.InputInt8(1));
3423 break;
3424 }
3425 case kX64I8x16ExtractLaneS: {
3426 Register dst = i.OutputRegister();
3427 __ Pextrb(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0), i.InputInt8(1));
3428 __ movsxbl(dst, dst);
3429 break;
3430 }
3431 case kX64I8x16ReplaceLane: {
3432 if (HasRegisterInput(instr, 2)) {
3433 __ Pinsrb(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputRegister(2),
3434 i.InputInt8(1));
3435 } else {
3436 __ Pinsrb(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputOperand(2), i.InputInt8(1));
3437 }
3438 break;
3439 }
3440 case kX64I8x16SConvertI16x8: {
3441 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
3442 __ Packsswb(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3443 break;
3444 }
3445 case kX64I8x16Neg: {
3446 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3447 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(0);
3448 if (dst == src) {
3449 __ Pcmpeqd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
3450 __ Psignb(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
3451 } else {
3452 __ Pxor(dst, dst);
3453 __ Psubb(dst, src);
3454 }
3455 break;
3456 }
3457 case kX64I8x16Shl: {
3458 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3459 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
3460 // Temp registers for shift mask and additional moves to XMM registers.
3461 Register tmp = i.ToRegister(instr->TempAt(0));
3462 XMMRegister tmp_simd = i.TempSimd128Register(1);
3463 if (HasImmediateInput(instr, 1)) {
3464 // Perform 16-bit shift, then mask away low bits.
3465 uint8_t shift = i.InputInt3(1);
3466 __ Psllw(dst, byte{shift});
3467
3468 uint8_t bmask = static_cast<uint8_t>(0xff << shift);
3469 uint32_t mask = bmask << 24 | bmask << 16 | bmask << 8 | bmask;
3470 __ movl(tmp, Immediate(mask));
3471 __ Movd(tmp_simd, tmp);
3472 __ Pshufd(tmp_simd, tmp_simd, uint8_t{0});
3473 __ Pand(dst, tmp_simd);
3474 } else {
3475 // Mask off the unwanted bits before word-shifting.
3476 __ Pcmpeqw(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
3477 // Take shift value modulo 8.
3478 __ movq(tmp, i.InputRegister(1));
3479 __ andq(tmp, Immediate(7));
3480 __ addq(tmp, Immediate(8));
3481 __ Movq(tmp_simd, tmp);
3482 __ Psrlw(kScratchDoubleReg, tmp_simd);
3483 __ Packuswb(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
3484 __ Pand(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
3485 // TODO(zhin): subq here to avoid asking for another temporary register,
3486 // examine codegen for other i8x16 shifts, they use less instructions.
3487 __ subq(tmp, Immediate(8));
3488 __ Movq(tmp_simd, tmp);
3489 __ Psllw(dst, tmp_simd);
3490 }
3491 break;
3492 }
3493 case kX64I8x16ShrS: {
3494 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3495 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
3496 if (HasImmediateInput(instr, 1)) {
3497 __ Punpckhbw(kScratchDoubleReg, dst);
3498 __ Punpcklbw(dst, dst);
3499 uint8_t shift = i.InputInt3(1) + 8;
3500 __ Psraw(kScratchDoubleReg, shift);
3501 __ Psraw(dst, shift);
3502 __ Packsswb(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
3503 } else {
3504 // Temp registers for shift mask andadditional moves to XMM registers.
3505 Register tmp = i.ToRegister(instr->TempAt(0));
3506 XMMRegister tmp_simd = i.TempSimd128Register(1);
3507 // Unpack the bytes into words, do arithmetic shifts, and repack.
3508 __ Punpckhbw(kScratchDoubleReg, dst);
3509 __ Punpcklbw(dst, dst);
3510 // Prepare shift value
3511 __ movq(tmp, i.InputRegister(1));
3512 // Take shift value modulo 8.
3513 __ andq(tmp, Immediate(7));
3514 __ addq(tmp, Immediate(8));
3515 __ Movq(tmp_simd, tmp);
3516 __ Psraw(kScratchDoubleReg, tmp_simd);
3517 __ Psraw(dst, tmp_simd);
3518 __ Packsswb(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
3519 }
3520 break;
3521 }
3522 case kX64I8x16Add: {
3523 __ Paddb(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3524 break;
3525 }
3526 case kX64I8x16AddSaturateS: {
3527 __ Paddsb(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3528 break;
3529 }
3530 case kX64I8x16Sub: {
3531 __ Psubb(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3532 break;
3533 }
3534 case kX64I8x16SubSaturateS: {
3535 __ Psubsb(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3536 break;
3537 }
3538 case kX64I8x16Mul: {
3539 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3540 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
3541 XMMRegister right = i.InputSimd128Register(1);
3542 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
3543 // I16x8 view of I8x16
3544 // left = AAaa AAaa ... AAaa AAaa
3545 // right= BBbb BBbb ... BBbb BBbb
3546 // t = 00AA 00AA ... 00AA 00AA
3547 // s = 00BB 00BB ... 00BB 00BB
3548 __ Movaps(tmp, dst);
3549 __ Movaps(kScratchDoubleReg, right);
3550 __ Psrlw(tmp, byte{8});
3551 __ Psrlw(kScratchDoubleReg, byte{8});
3552 // dst = left * 256
3553 __ Psllw(dst, byte{8});
3554 // t = I16x8Mul(t, s)
3555 // => __PP __PP ... __PP __PP
3556 __ Pmullw(tmp, kScratchDoubleReg);
3557 // dst = I16x8Mul(left * 256, right)
3558 // => pp__ pp__ ... pp__ pp__
3559 __ Pmullw(dst, right);
3560 // t = I16x8Shl(t, 8)
3561 // => PP00 PP00 ... PP00 PP00
3562 __ Psllw(tmp, byte{8});
3563 // dst = I16x8Shr(dst, 8)
3564 // => 00pp 00pp ... 00pp 00pp
3565 __ Psrlw(dst, byte{8});
3566 // dst = I16x8Or(dst, t)
3567 // => PPpp PPpp ... PPpp PPpp
3568 __ Por(dst, tmp);
3569 break;
3570 }
3571 case kX64I8x16MinS: {
3572 __ Pminsb(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3573 break;
3574 }
3575 case kX64I8x16MaxS: {
3576 __ Pmaxsb(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3577 break;
3578 }
3579 case kX64I8x16Eq: {
3580 __ Pcmpeqb(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3581 break;
3582 }
3583 case kX64I8x16Ne: {
3584 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
3585 __ Pcmpeqb(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3586 __ Pcmpeqb(tmp, tmp);
3587 __ Pxor(i.OutputSimd128Register(), tmp);
3588 break;
3589 }
3590 case kX64I8x16GtS: {
3591 __ Pcmpgtb(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3592 break;
3593 }
3594 case kX64I8x16GeS: {
3595 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3596 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(1);
3597 __ Pminsb(dst, src);
3598 __ Pcmpeqb(dst, src);
3599 break;
3600 }
3601 case kX64I8x16UConvertI16x8: {
3602 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
3603 __ Packuswb(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3604 break;
3605 }
3606 case kX64I8x16ShrU: {
3607 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3608 // Unpack the bytes into words, do logical shifts, and repack.
3609 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
3610 // Temp registers for shift mask andadditional moves to XMM registers.
3611 Register tmp = i.ToRegister(instr->TempAt(0));
3612 XMMRegister tmp_simd = i.TempSimd128Register(1);
3613 if (HasImmediateInput(instr, 1)) {
3614 // Perform 16-bit shift, then mask away high bits.
3615 uint8_t shift = i.InputInt3(1);
3616 __ Psrlw(dst, byte{shift});
3617
3618 uint8_t bmask = 0xff >> shift;
3619 uint32_t mask = bmask << 24 | bmask << 16 | bmask << 8 | bmask;
3620 __ movl(tmp, Immediate(mask));
3621 __ Movd(tmp_simd, tmp);
3622 __ Pshufd(tmp_simd, tmp_simd, byte{0});
3623 __ Pand(dst, tmp_simd);
3624 } else {
3625 __ Punpckhbw(kScratchDoubleReg, dst);
3626 __ Punpcklbw(dst, dst);
3627 // Prepare shift value
3628 __ movq(tmp, i.InputRegister(1));
3629 // Take shift value modulo 8.
3630 __ andq(tmp, Immediate(7));
3631 __ addq(tmp, Immediate(8));
3632 __ Movq(tmp_simd, tmp);
3633 __ Psrlw(kScratchDoubleReg, tmp_simd);
3634 __ Psrlw(dst, tmp_simd);
3635 __ Packuswb(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
3636 }
3637 break;
3638 }
3639 case kX64I8x16AddSaturateU: {
3640 __ Paddusb(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3641 break;
3642 }
3643 case kX64I8x16SubSaturateU: {
3644 __ Psubusb(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3645 break;
3646 }
3647 case kX64I8x16MinU: {
3648 __ Pminub(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3649 break;
3650 }
3651 case kX64I8x16MaxU: {
3652 __ Pmaxub(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3653 break;
3654 }
3655 case kX64I8x16GtU: {
3656 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3657 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(1);
3658 XMMRegister tmp = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
3659 __ Pmaxub(dst, src);
3660 __ Pcmpeqb(dst, src);
3661 __ Pcmpeqb(tmp, tmp);
3662 __ Pxor(dst, tmp);
3663 break;
3664 }
3665 case kX64I8x16GeU: {
3666 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3667 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(1);
3668 __ Pminub(dst, src);
3669 __ Pcmpeqb(dst, src);
3670 break;
3671 }
3672 case kX64I8x16RoundingAverageU: {
3673 __ Pavgb(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3674 break;
3675 }
3676 case kX64I8x16Abs: {
3677 __ Pabsb(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0));
3678 break;
3679 }
3680 case kX64I8x16BitMask: {
3681 __ Pmovmskb(i.OutputRegister(), i.InputSimd128Register(0));
3682 break;
3683 }
3684 case kX64S128And: {
3685 __ Pand(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3686 break;
3687 }
3688 case kX64S128Or: {
3689 __ Por(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3690 break;
3691 }
3692 case kX64S128Xor: {
3693 __ Pxor(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3694 break;
3695 }
3696 case kX64S128Not: {
3697 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3698 XMMRegister src = i.InputSimd128Register(0);
3699 if (dst == src) {
3700 __ Movaps(kScratchDoubleReg, dst);
3701 __ Pcmpeqd(dst, dst);
3702 __ Pxor(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
3703 } else {
3704 __ Pcmpeqd(dst, dst);
3705 __ Pxor(dst, src);
3706 }
3707
3708 break;
3709 }
3710 case kX64S128Select: {
3711 // Mask used here is stored in dst.
3712 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3713 __ Movaps(kScratchDoubleReg, i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3714 __ Xorps(kScratchDoubleReg, i.InputSimd128Register(2));
3715 __ Andps(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
3716 __ Xorps(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(2));
3717 break;
3718 }
3719 case kX64S128AndNot: {
3720 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3721 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
3722 // The inputs have been inverted by instruction selector, so we can call
3723 // andnps here without any modifications.
3724 __ Andnps(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3725 break;
3726 }
3727 case kX64S8x16Swizzle: {
3728 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
3729 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3730 XMMRegister mask = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
3731
3732 // Out-of-range indices should return 0, add 112 so that any value > 15
3733 // saturates to 128 (top bit set), so pshufb will zero that lane.
3734 __ Move(mask, uint32_t{0x70707070});
3735 __ Pshufd(mask, mask, uint8_t{0x0});
3736 __ Paddusb(mask, i.InputSimd128Register(1));
3737 __ Pshufb(dst, mask);
3738 break;
3739 }
3740 case kX64S8x16Shuffle: {
3741 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3742 XMMRegister tmp_simd = i.TempSimd128Register(0);
3743 if (instr->InputCount() == 5) { // only one input operand
3744 uint32_t mask[4] = {};
3745 DCHECK_EQ(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
3746 for (int j = 4; j > 0; j--) {
3747 mask[j - 1] = i.InputUint32(j);
3748 }
3749
3750 SetupSimdImmediateInRegister(tasm(), mask, tmp_simd);
3751 __ Pshufb(dst, tmp_simd);
3752 } else { // two input operands
3753 DCHECK_EQ(6, instr->InputCount())((void) 0);
3754 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_INSTR(Movups, kScratchDoubleReg, 0);
3755 uint32_t mask1[4] = {};
3756 for (int j = 5; j > 1; j--) {
3757 uint32_t lanes = i.InputUint32(j);
3758 for (int k = 0; k < 32; k += 8) {
3759 uint8_t lane = lanes >> k;
3760 mask1[j - 2] |= (lane < kSimd128Size ? lane : 0x80) << k;
3761 }
3762 }
3763 SetupSimdImmediateInRegister(tasm(), mask1, tmp_simd);
3764 __ Pshufb(kScratchDoubleReg, tmp_simd);
3765 uint32_t mask2[4] = {};
3766 if (instr->InputAt(1)->IsSimd128Register()) {
3767 XMMRegister src1 = i.InputSimd128Register(1);
3768 if (src1 != dst) __ movups(dst, src1);
3769 } else {
3770 __ Movups(dst, i.InputOperand(1));
3771 }
3772 for (int j = 5; j > 1; j--) {
3773 uint32_t lanes = i.InputUint32(j);
3774 for (int k = 0; k < 32; k += 8) {
3775 uint8_t lane = lanes >> k;
3776 mask2[j - 2] |= (lane >= kSimd128Size ? (lane & 0x0F) : 0x80) << k;
3777 }
3778 }
3779 SetupSimdImmediateInRegister(tasm(), mask2, tmp_simd);
3780 __ Pshufb(dst, tmp_simd);
3781 __ Por(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
3782 }
3783 break;
3784 }
3785 case kX64S8x16LoadSplat: {
3786 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
3787 __ Pinsrb(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.MemoryOperand(), 0);
3788 __ Pxor(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
3789 __ Pshufb(i.OutputSimd128Register(), kScratchDoubleReg);
3790 break;
3791 }
3792 case kX64S16x8LoadSplat: {
3793 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
3794 __ Pinsrw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.MemoryOperand(), 0);
3795 __ Pshuflw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.OutputSimd128Register(),
3796 uint8_t{0});
3797 __ Punpcklqdq(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.OutputSimd128Register());
3798 break;
3799 }
3800 case kX64S32x4LoadSplat: {
3801 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
3802 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
3803 CpuFeatureScope avx_scope(tasm(), AVX);
3804 __ vbroadcastss(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.MemoryOperand());
3805 } else {
3806 __ Movss(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.MemoryOperand());
3807 __ Shufps(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.OutputSimd128Register(),
3808 byte{0});
3809 }
3810 break;
3811 }
3812 case kX64S64x2LoadSplat: {
3813 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
3814 __ Movddup(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.MemoryOperand());
3815 break;
3816 }
3817 case kX64I16x8Load8x8S: {
3818 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
3819 __ Pmovsxbw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.MemoryOperand());
3820 break;
3821 }
3822 case kX64I16x8Load8x8U: {
3823 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
3824 __ Pmovzxbw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.MemoryOperand());
3825 break;
3826 }
3827 case kX64I32x4Load16x4S: {
3828 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
3829 __ Pmovsxwd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.MemoryOperand());
3830 break;
3831 }
3832 case kX64I32x4Load16x4U: {
3833 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
3834 __ Pmovzxwd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.MemoryOperand());
3835 break;
3836 }
3837 case kX64I64x2Load32x2S: {
3838 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
3839 __ Pmovsxdq(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.MemoryOperand());
3840 break;
3841 }
3842 case kX64I64x2Load32x2U: {
3843 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
3844 __ Pmovzxdq(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.MemoryOperand());
3845 break;
3846 }
3847 case kX64S128LoadMem32Zero: {
3848 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
3849 __ Movd(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.MemoryOperand());
3850 break;
3851 }
3852 case kX64S128LoadMem64Zero: {
3853 EmitOOLTrapIfNeeded(zone(), this, opcode, instr, __ pc_offset());
3854 __ Movq(i.OutputSimd128Register(), i.MemoryOperand());
3855 break;
3856 }
3857 case kX64S32x4Swizzle: {
3858 DCHECK_EQ(2, instr->InputCount())((void) 0);
3859 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_IMM_INSTR(Pshufd, i.OutputSimd128Register(), 0,
3860 i.InputUint8(1));
3861 break;
3862 }
3863 case kX64S32x4Shuffle: {
3864 DCHECK_EQ(4, instr->InputCount())((void) 0); // Swizzles should be handled above.
3865 uint8_t shuffle = i.InputUint8(2);
3866 DCHECK_NE(0xe4, shuffle)((void) 0); // A simple blend should be handled below.
3867 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_IMM_INSTR(Pshufd, kScratchDoubleReg, 1, shuffle);
3868 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_IMM_INSTR(Pshufd, i.OutputSimd128Register(), 0, shuffle);
3869 __ Pblendw(i.OutputSimd128Register(), kScratchDoubleReg, i.InputUint8(3));
3870 break;
3871 }
3872 case kX64S16x8Blend: {
3873 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_IMM_SHUFFLE(Pblendw, i.InputUint8(2));
3874 break;
3875 }
3876 case kX64S16x8HalfShuffle1: {
3877 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3878 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_IMM_INSTR(Pshuflw, dst, 0, i.InputUint8(1));
3879 __ Pshufhw(dst, dst, i.InputUint8(2));
3880 break;
3881 }
3882 case kX64S16x8HalfShuffle2: {
3883 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3884 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_IMM_INSTR(Pshuflw, kScratchDoubleReg, 1, i.InputUint8(2));
3885 __ Pshufhw(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg, i.InputUint8(3));
3886 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_IMM_INSTR(Pshuflw, dst, 0, i.InputUint8(2));
3887 __ Pshufhw(dst, dst, i.InputUint8(3));
3888 __ Pblendw(dst, kScratchDoubleReg, i.InputUint8(4));
3889 break;
3890 }
3891 case kX64S8x16Alignr: {
3892 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_IMM_SHUFFLE(Palignr, i.InputUint8(2));
3893 break;
3894 }
3895 case kX64S16x8Dup: {
3896 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3897 uint8_t lane = i.InputInt8(1) & 0x7;
3898 uint8_t lane4 = lane & 0x3;
3899 uint8_t half_dup = lane4 | (lane4 << 2) | (lane4 << 4) | (lane4 << 6);
3900 if (lane < 4) {
3901 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_IMM_INSTR(Pshuflw, dst, 0, half_dup);
3902 __ Pshufd(dst, dst, uint8_t{0});
3903 } else {
3904 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_IMM_INSTR(Pshufhw, dst, 0, half_dup);
3905 __ Pshufd(dst, dst, uint8_t{0xaa});
3906 }
3907 break;
3908 }
3909 case kX64S8x16Dup: {
3910 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3911 uint8_t lane = i.InputInt8(1) & 0xf;
3912 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
3913 if (lane < 8) {
3914 __ Punpcklbw(dst, dst);
3915 } else {
3916 __ Punpckhbw(dst, dst);
3917 }
3918 lane &= 0x7;
3919 uint8_t lane4 = lane & 0x3;
3920 uint8_t half_dup = lane4 | (lane4 << 2) | (lane4 << 4) | (lane4 << 6);
3921 if (lane < 4) {
3922 __ Pshuflw(dst, dst, half_dup);
3923 __ Pshufd(dst, dst, uint8_t{0});
3924 } else {
3925 __ Pshufhw(dst, dst, half_dup);
3926 __ Pshufd(dst, dst, uint8_t{0xaa});
3927 }
3928 break;
3929 }
3930 case kX64S64x2UnpackHigh:
3931 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_PUNPCK_SHUFFLE(Punpckhqdq);
3932 break;
3933 case kX64S32x4UnpackHigh:
3934 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_PUNPCK_SHUFFLE(Punpckhdq);
3935 break;
3936 case kX64S16x8UnpackHigh:
3937 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_PUNPCK_SHUFFLE(Punpckhwd);
3938 break;
3939 case kX64S8x16UnpackHigh:
3940 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_PUNPCK_SHUFFLE(Punpckhbw);
3941 break;
3942 case kX64S64x2UnpackLow:
3943 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_PUNPCK_SHUFFLE(Punpcklqdq);
3944 break;
3945 case kX64S32x4UnpackLow:
3946 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_PUNPCK_SHUFFLE(Punpckldq);
3947 break;
3948 case kX64S16x8UnpackLow:
3949 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_PUNPCK_SHUFFLE(Punpcklwd);
3950 break;
3951 case kX64S8x16UnpackLow:
3952 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_PUNPCK_SHUFFLE(Punpcklbw);
3953 break;
3954 case kX64S16x8UnzipHigh: {
3955 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3956 XMMRegister src2 = dst;
3957 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
3958 if (instr->InputCount() == 2) {
3959 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_INSTR(Movups, kScratchDoubleReg, 1);
3960 __ Psrld(kScratchDoubleReg, byte{16});
3961 src2 = kScratchDoubleReg;
3962 }
3963 __ Psrld(dst, byte{16});
3964 __ Packusdw(dst, src2);
3965 break;
3966 }
3967 case kX64S16x8UnzipLow: {
3968 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3969 XMMRegister src2 = dst;
3970 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
3971 __ Pxor(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
3972 if (instr->InputCount() == 2) {
3973 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_IMM_INSTR(Pblendw, kScratchDoubleReg, 1, uint8_t{0x55});
3974 src2 = kScratchDoubleReg;
3975 }
3976 __ Pblendw(dst, kScratchDoubleReg, uint8_t{0xaa});
3977 __ Packusdw(dst, src2);
3978 break;
3979 }
3980 case kX64S8x16UnzipHigh: {
3981 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3982 XMMRegister src2 = dst;
3983 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
3984 if (instr->InputCount() == 2) {
3985 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_INSTR(Movups, kScratchDoubleReg, 1);
3986 __ Psrlw(kScratchDoubleReg, byte{8});
3987 src2 = kScratchDoubleReg;
3988 }
3989 __ Psrlw(dst, byte{8});
3990 __ Packuswb(dst, src2);
3991 break;
3992 }
3993 case kX64S8x16UnzipLow: {
3994 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
3995 XMMRegister src2 = dst;
3996 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
3997 if (instr->InputCount() == 2) {
3998 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_INSTR(Movups, kScratchDoubleReg, 1);
3999 __ Psllw(kScratchDoubleReg, byte{8});
4000 __ Psrlw(kScratchDoubleReg, byte{8});
4001 src2 = kScratchDoubleReg;
4002 }
4003 __ Psllw(dst, byte{8});
4004 __ Psrlw(dst, byte{8});
4005 __ Packuswb(dst, src2);
4006 break;
4007 }
4008 case kX64S8x16TransposeLow: {
4009 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
4010 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
4011 __ Psllw(dst, byte{8});
4012 if (instr->InputCount() == 1) {
4013 __ Movups(kScratchDoubleReg, dst);
4014 } else {
4015 DCHECK_EQ(2, instr->InputCount())((void) 0);
4016 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_INSTR(Movups, kScratchDoubleReg, 1);
4017 __ Psllw(kScratchDoubleReg, byte{8});
4018 }
4019 __ Psrlw(dst, byte{8});
4020 __ Por(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
4021 break;
4022 }
4023 case kX64S8x16TransposeHigh: {
4024 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
4025 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
4026 __ Psrlw(dst, byte{8});
4027 if (instr->InputCount() == 1) {
4028 __ Movups(kScratchDoubleReg, dst);
4029 } else {
4030 DCHECK_EQ(2, instr->InputCount())((void) 0);
4031 ASSEMBLE_SIMD_INSTR(Movups, kScratchDoubleReg, 1);
4032 __ Psrlw(kScratchDoubleReg, byte{8});
4033 }
4034 __ Psllw(kScratchDoubleReg, byte{8});
4035 __ Por(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
4036 break;
4037 }
4038 case kX64S8x8Reverse:
4039 case kX64S8x4Reverse:
4040 case kX64S8x2Reverse: {
4041 DCHECK_EQ(1, instr->InputCount())((void) 0);
4042 XMMRegister dst = i.OutputSimd128Register();
4043 DCHECK_EQ(dst, i.InputSimd128Register(0))((void) 0);
4044 if (arch_opcode != kX64S8x2Reverse) {
4045 // First shuffle words into position.
4046 uint8_t shuffle_mask = arch_opcode == kX64S8x4Reverse ? 0xB1 : 0x1B;
4047 __ Pshuflw(dst, dst, shuffle_mask);
4048 __ Pshufhw(dst, dst, shuffle_mask);
4049 }
4050 __ Movaps(kScratchDoubleReg, dst);
